chapter.name: Delicious Tutorials: Bpatcher
chapter.indexinfo: Learn how to make a patch within a patch
chapter.p: The bpatcher object does what it says on the tin--it lets you put a patcher within a patcher. Something to keep in mind is that you can't control the bpatcher with messages the same way you can other objects, since the inlets of the bpatcher are connected to the objects inside of it. This patcher demonstrates how to use a thispatcher object to send messages to the bpatcher itself.
